flawed_nl_solution:
He increased his speed by 150*0.3=45 mph
So his new speed was 150+45=<<150+45=195>>195 mph
He increased it a further 10 mph so his new speed is 195+10=<<195+10=250>>250 mph
#### 250

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 205, not 250. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
